data.title: Interview - Carl Gottlieb (Screenwriter - Jaws, Jaws 2, Jaws 3-D)
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from Let's Talk - JAWS on Spotify. Into The MysticEpisode 10: Interview - Carl Gottlieb (Screenwriter - Jaws, Jaws 2, Jaws 3-D)Jason Connell and Sal Rodriguez have well-known screenwriter, director, and actor Carl Gottlieb (Jaws, Jaws 2, Jaws 3-D) on the show. They discuss his legendary screenplays, his directorial debut, and his famous book The Jaws Log.Official Sponsor:Narragansett BeerRecorded: 05-06-24 &Â  07-19-23Studio: Just Curious MediaListen:BuzzsproutApple PodcastsSpotifyAmazon MusiciHeartRadioHosts:Jason ConnellSal Rodriguez#justcuriousmedia #letstalkjaws #mrjasonconnell #salvadorlosangeles #jaws #jaws2 #jaws3D #stevenspielberg #johnwilliams #peterbenchley #carlgottlieb #royscheider #richarddreyfuss #robertshaw #narragansettbeer #marthasvineyard #amityisland #universal #blockbuster #sharkSend us a textSupport the Show.
